features: We formulated Kick Active Peppermint and Tea Tree Shampoo for movers, shakers, and athletes! 11 powerful, pure, ultra-potent botanical ingredients (Tea Tree leaf, Peppermint, Eucalyptus, Rosemary, Aloe Vera and more!) restore optimal scalp balance to relieve itch and support healthy looking hair. 100% irritant-free.

Hair strengthening shampoo and moisturizing shampoo in one: Did you know sweat-induced dandruff and dry scalp can lead to hair loss? Kick Active's Anti Hairloss Shampoo contains Aloe at just the right potency to reduce the dandruff and dry scalp that cause hair loss when left untreated.

Satisfaction: After just 1 treatment with Kick Active, you’ll never want your old, ineffective Men’s Hair Shampoo back! Users say our dandruff shampoo for men is the best shampoo for thin hair and itchy scalp. Go ahead and click add to cart now to experience strong, soft, dandruff-free hair - or get a refund, no questions asked.

Empower better hair days - won't feel heavy or dry the scalp: Unmanageable, dried out hair? While many hair care products leave you feeling dry, frizzy, or like your head's covered in cooking oil, Kick Active Peppermint & Tea Tree Oil Shampoo leaves hair soft and light with an invigorating clean scent that lasts all day.

Natural Formula, no harsh chemicals. Because irritating surfactants frequently cause skin dryness, flaking, itching and redness - which often causes hair loss - we created our natural dandruff shampoo without the naughty stuff! It’s 100% free of SLS/sulfates, parabens and harsh chemicals - plus cruelty-free and color safe.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Premium Shampoo for Active Men Does itchy scalp drive you crazy all day long? Ramp up your hair grooming regimen with KICK ACTIVE Anti-Dandruff Shampoo, which is specially formulated for men’s hair. Jam-packed with active botanical extracts, it’s the perfect choice when you need one that can do much more than clean. It contains 11 herbal essences, including tea tree oil and rosemary that are proven to promote stronger and fuller hair by strengthening follicles and reactivating hair cells that stimulate new growth.

Flake Free Fullness Dry scalp and dandruff flakes can lead to hair breakage and hair fall, which will eventually lead to temporary hair loss. Kick Active men’s shampoo is everything you need to solve this frustrating dilemma! It contains a high concentration of aloe vera, lavender, and peppermint oil, three of the most powerful ingredients from nature that stimulate hair growth by increasing blood circulation to the scalp. They can also relieve dry scalp and give hair a healthy shine.

Clean & Color Enhance This shampoo cleanses deeply through excess dirt and sweat, giving you a kickstart in the morning to wake up and get in the zone. Rosemary, in particular, slows down the graying of hair and is gentle on color-treated hair. This is not just your ordinary color-safe shampoo. It also enhances and brightens your current hair color. Serious Scalp Care Aloe vera is a miracle plant in the beauty industry and for good reason! It contains proteolytic enzymes that repair damaged hair strands and make them stronger, remove dead skin cells on the scalp, prevents itching and reduces dandruff while actin as a great conditioner that leaves the hair smooth and shiny. Eucalyptus reduces scalp inflammation and stimulates hair follicles, promoting growth of stronger hair. All 11 ingredients come together to give you the healthiest hair you could ever have! Energizing with a Refreshing Mint Scent Don’t let hair loss and dandruff ruin your confidence. Whether you’re sweating it out at the gym or smartly dressed in a suit. Start your day with the invigorating scent of mint and the satisfying feeling of dandruff-free scalp and healthy, strong hair!

100% Natural - A Gentle Giant Kick meticulously tests each formulation to the strictest standards for purity, potency, safety, and effect while ensuring every bottle is 100% SLS/Sulphate free, Paraben Free, Cruelty-free, and color safe too!
Kick Men's Shampoo Kick Men's Conditioner Kick Men's Styling Cream

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Refreshing Solution for Dandruff and Itchy Scalp
reviews.reviewText: I recently tried Kick Active Shampoo and was pleasantly surprised by how much I liked it. The refreshing feeling it gave me was amazing, thanks to the combination of tea tree oil and peppermint in the formula. The shampoo also proved effective in addressing my dandruff issue; after just one use, I noticed that my dandruff had disappeared. Also no more itchy scalp. While it's too soon to tell how long the effects will last, based on my first use, I highly recommend this product. The formula seems to be effective in targeting and solving specific hair and scalp issues. It also has a pleasant scent and lathers well. Overall, I'm impressed with Kick Active Shampoo and plan to continue using it in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best I ever had
reviews.reviewText: The combination of shampoo and conditioner have my hair and head feeling and looking better than every. I immediately noticed how much less product(compared to previous products) I needed to get a great lather. A little goes a long way. It makes my scalp and head tingle, I can feel it moisturizing, healing and cleaning my scalp. Lastly it doesn’t leave a nasty residue when I rinse it out. My hair feels clean and fresh. Bonus, The smell is great too! This is the best brand of hair products I have ever used. I’ll be buying this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great lathering shampoo with refreshing mint and tea tree oil
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this shampoo because of it's natural ingredients, and specifically the tea tree oil and peppermint combination. It has a wonderful smell, very minty almost like mint ice cream. Typically tea tree oil products have a very distinctive smell, medicinal almost like kerosene, but this combination is perfect. Everything is perfectly balanced. Once you rinse the shampoo from your hair, the scent does not linger like perfumed shampoos.From time to time, I do have a dry, itchy scalp and was hoping this shampoo would help treat that. It's been two weeks now and I can say that it's definitely is helping. It lathers up nicely and has a refreshing tingle and coolness to the way it feels on your scalp. It rinses nicely and my hair is squeaky clean and doesn't feel like it's been chemically stripped. I bought this for myself, as my wife and daughters all have their own specialty shampoos, but I've noticed that everyone has been using my new shampoo, so they must like it too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My head just started to inch for no reason. Bothered me for about a month. I hadn't changed shampoos or done anything different. I was agrivated enough to try something new. This product works well! After about a week and half of use I don't have any issues! It's is a little strong at first but sort of refreshing after you get used to it. Smells like peppermint!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The only OTC shampoo that has worked
reviews.reviewText: I’ve tried a lot of shampoo to combat my Irish skin scalp. I not only have dandruff, I have chunks of white, dead skin cells that sometimes accumulate on my scalp. Gross? Yes. A nuisance? Absolutely. This stuff has completely taken care of my issues, smells refreshing (not chemical-ish) and is a good price for the amount you get. I also have prescription shampoo that’s $80 and I have needed to use it! Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feel the tingle,
reviews.reviewText: I've used many different types of dandruff shampoo, there was one brand in a green bottle red lid that was amazing till they changed the ingredients (in the 90s) since then I've been on the search trying this trying that with not one giving me that tingling scalp after showering. This is the first that I've tried that actually gives me that tingling on my scalp feeling it work. Bought this by mistake I might add, the best oooops I've ever done. I'm sold, it lathers up really good, I use about a quarter size and that's probably too much as the lather is really good. Feels squeaky clean after rinsing, just amazing I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this shampooReasonable price, nice aroma, and cleans hair well with no residue

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just buy it
reviews.reviewText: I have a decent head of hair that I'm overly concerned with losing some day, which is the main reason I purchased this product --promising to negate that-- over other sulfate/paraben/chemical-free shampoos. I'm a couple bottles in now and cannot say that it has made my hair any thicker (though it certainly hasn't made it thinner) but it does leave my hair feeling clean, soft, revitalized and full. Before discovering Kick and while attempting to make the switch from the 2-in-1 brands I grew up with, I tried a few other options that left my hair feeling frizzy and dry in the absence of conditioner. This hasn't been the case with Kick. After each use my hair is smooth, full of volume and very trainable. I find the peppermint/tree oil scent to be refreshing and enjoy the tingling sensation I get when applying it to my head. Dandruff has never been a big issue for me, but I do notice less flakes in the cold/dry seasons. Unfortunately, Kick isn't the cure to baldness, but overall, it's a great shampoo that's worth trying if you're trying to level up your hair care game.
Manage my oily scalp and getting rid of my dandruff problem, with mint cooling effect.
